CustomField.description: Formula to calculate the total for all DS scorecard fields
CustomField.formula: VALUE(TEXT(PlatformCentricVisionPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(TechnicalAdvocacyPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(CredibleReferencesPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(CompellingReasontoActPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(BusinessCasePick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(ConvincingDeploymentPlanPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(ExecutiveAdvocacyPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(BusinessSponsorPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(FundingPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(ITAdvocacyPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(SequenceOfEventsPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(ApproversPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(ContractTermsPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(FinancialTermsPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(PricingPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(LegalPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(ServicesPick__c)) + VALUE(TEXT(RandDPick__c))
CustomField.label: Score Total
